screen.immersivemc.config.title: ImmersiveMC Config
config.immersivemc.open_wiki_message: Would you like to open the ImmersiveMC wiki, copy it to your clipboard, or cancel?
config.immersivemc.disable_outside_vr.de: Disables all of ImmersiveMC unless you're in VR.
screen.immersivemc.backpack_config.title: Bag Customization
config.immersivemc.backpack_mode.0.desc: Your bag looks like a bundle! Texture and model created by NahNotFox.
config.immersivemc.backpack_mode.1.desc: The bundle bag, but colorable! Texture and model created by NahNotFox.
config.immersivemc.backpack_mode.2.desc: ImmersiveMC's original bag, shaped like a bucket.
config.immersivemc.backpack_mode.3.desc: A low detail version of the Bucket Bag.
config.immersivemc.reach_behind_backpack: Allows opening/closing the bag by reaching behind your back.
Allows opening/closing the bag by reaching over your shoulder. When active, disables the selected item switching done via the same movement in Vivecraft.
Behind Your Back and Over Your Shoulder
Allows opening/closing the bag by reaching behind your back and over your shoulder. When active, disables the selected item switching done via reaching over your shoulder in Vivecraft.
Disables the ability to open/close the bag via movement.
screen.immersivemc.immersives_config.sub: Note: Any immersives that are disabled by server admins override your settings here!
screen.immersivemc.immersives_config.can: Can't change the config right now! Wait a bit for the server's config to sync!
config.immersivemc.animals.desc: Hold food or an item used to breed an animal in one hand, then hold both hands at the animal to put it in love mode!
config.immersivemc.anvil.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the anvil immersive.
config.immersivemc.armor.desc: Allows VR users to equip armor by physically placing armor pieces on their person.
config.immersivemc.backpack_button.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use backpacks. VR Only!
config.immersivemc.barrel.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the barrel immersive.
config.immersivemc.beacon.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the beacon immersive.
config.immersivemc.brewing.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the brewing stand immersive.
config.immersivemc.button.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to push buttons with their hand.
config.immersivemc.campfire.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to hold food above a campfire to cook it.
config.immersivemc.cauldron.desc: Enables/disables the ability to interact with a cauldron without button presses. Turn an item filled with liquid upside-down over a cauldron to empty it, place an empty item that can be filled with liquid into a cauldron to fill it up, or place an item that interacts with a cauldron inside to perform the interaction! VR Only.
config.immersivemc.chest.desc: Enables/disables the ability for players to open/close chests without the GUI. Make sure to enable 'Right Click Chests' to use the chest outside of VR! You can punch the chest to cycle which items are on top!
config.immersivemc.door.desc: Enables/disables the opening and closing of doors and fence gates using hand motions.
config.immersivemc.crafting.desc: Enables/disables the placing of items physically on the crafting table.
config.immersivemc.tinkers_construct_cra: Use Tinkers' Construct Crafting Station Immersion
Enables/disables the ability to use the Tinkers' Construct Crafting Station immersives.
config.immersivemc.enchanting_table.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the enchanting table immersive.
config.immersivemc.furnace.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the furnace immersive.
config.immersivemc.hopper.desc: Enables/disables the ability for players to put items into and take items out of hoppers.
config.immersivemc.iron_furnaces_furnace: Enables/disables the ability to use the Iron Furnaces' furnace immersive.
config.immersivemc.jukebox.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to physically put discs in the jukebox.
config.immersivemc.lever.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to physically flick levers.
config.immersivemc.pet.desc: Whether VR players can pet pets they have tamed (or animals that are tamed for everyone once tamed).
config.immersivemc.ranged_grab.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to grab items by flicking their wrist after holding down the trigger.
config.immersivemc.repeater.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to physically move redstone repeater torches.
config.immersivemc.shield.desc: When enabled, allows VR users to hold their shields in the direction of something to block it; no need to right click!
config.immersivemc.shulker.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the Shulker Box immersive. You can punch the Shulker Box to cycle which items are shown!
config.immersivemc.smithing_table.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the smithing table immersive.
config.immersivemc.throw.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR users to throw items (Tridents, Fishing Rods, and throwables such as snowballs, eggs, ender pearls, etc.). Hold the 'break block' button, then release as you throw!
config.immersivemc.written_book.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to physically interact with written books.
Disables the vanilla GUIs and other vanilla interactions for any immersives that can be interacted with and enabled in the ImmersiveMC settings.
config.immersivemc.return_items.desc: Returns items from immersives not used to store items when you walk far enough away.
config.immersivemc.do_rumble.desc: Do controller rumbling for ImmersiveMC actions.
config.immersivemc.center_brewing.desc: When enabled, item placements for the brewing stand are centered, rather than emulate the GUI.
config.immersivemc.center_furnace.desc: When enabled, item placements for the furnace are centered, rather than emulate the GUI.
config.immersivemc.right_click_chest.des: When enabled, the immersive chest is opened/closed through a right click, rather than a hand motion. This allows Non-VR players to use the chest immersion! Punch the chest to cycle which row you have selected.
Whether the output of a crafting table that's shown above the table should slowly spin.
config.immersivemc.placement_mode.1: Place a Quarter of the Items
config.immersivemc.placement_mode.desc: When right-clicking or placing items into immersives, %s from the stack of items in your hand into the immersive.
config.immersivemc.pet_any_living.desc: When enabled while the ability to pet is also enabled, VR users can pet any living entity, rather than just pets they own.
config.immersivemc.use_pick_range: Use Pick Range as Ranged Grab Range
config.immersivemc.right_click_in_vr.des: Allow right-clicking in VR to interact with immersives, similarly to non-VR users.
config.immersivemc.3d_compat.desc: Moves the item areas for immersives to increase compatability with resource packs such as Classic 3D (16x).
config.immersivemc.crouch_bypass_immersi: When crouching, right-clicks bypass immersions and open vanilla interfaces.
screen.immersivemc.item_guide_customize_: Customize Item Guides. Hover over a preview for more info!
This setting controls what is shown for item slots in immersives that currently don't have any items.
config.immersivemc.item_guide.desc: This cube is shown in immersives in places where items can be placed but no item has been placed there.
config.immersivemc.item_guide_selected.d: This cube is shown in immersives in places where items can be placed but no item has been placed there AND the place is currently being hovered over by the mouse or pointed at by a controller.
config.immersivemc.item_guide_selected_r: Hovered Over Item Guide Red Value
config.immersivemc.item_guide_selected_g: Hovered Over Item Guide Green Value
config.immersivemc.item_guide_selected_b: Hovered Over Item Guide Blue Value
config.immersivemc.item_guide_selected_a: Hovered Over Item Guide Alpha Value
config.immersivemc.ranged_grab_color.des: Particles of this color are shown only in VR when pointing at an item to indicate you can pick it up with a ranged grab.
message.immersivemc.no_api: mc-vr-api could not be found! Make sure you have mc-vr-api %s or later, but no version before %s, installed!
message.immersivemc.not_in_vr: This feature only works while in VR!
message.immersivemc.no_api_server: mc-vr-api is not installed on the server! It must be installed to use this feature!
message.immersivemc.missing_immersives: You're missing Immersives from the following mods: %s. Check the logs for more details.
